form.official-title: To amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 and the National Community Service Act of 1990 to provide training for certain individuals to identify and apply for certain Federal grants, and for other purposes.

section.header: Identification of and application for certain Federal grants

subsection.text: Section 103(a)(11) of the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 (42 U.S.C. 4953(a)(11)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting and underserved after in rural; and
by inserting , including initiatives relating to identifying and applying for appropriate Federal grants for such areas after most.

subsection.text: Section 199N(b) of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12657(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (9), by striking the and after the semicolon;
by redesignating paragraph (10) as paragraph (11); and
by inserting after paragraph (9) the following:
providing training and technical assistance for participants in the national service programs to identify and apply for appropriate grants for entities in rural areas and underserved communities;
